alert.note: Alert for Eastern Culberson County; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 2:43PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Culberson County through 330 PM CDT... At 242 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles south of Pine Springs, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Guadalupe Mountains National Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Culberson County; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor
